name: Terri Oswalt
reviewText: These hypnosis sessions and audios have greatly helped me. His voice is very calming, and he uses imagery to put your mind in a good place

name: Allison Bennett
reviewText: Looking for the REAL DEAL? Here it is! HYPNO 4 U personalizes their approach for YOU as the individual client.

name: Susan Hicks
reviewText: I chose the weight loss audio. I have lost and maintained about 6 pounds. Thank you HYPNO 4 U

reviewText: I slept really well last night for probably the first time in a year

reviewText: After listening to myself-hypnosis audio 5 times, I gained clarity, opened my eyes, and changed my life

name: Jose Mario
reviewText: I'm doing more what I feel, saving energy and focusing better
